meanings.definition: Make a continuous rhythmic humming sound.
meanings.sent1: The bees were thrumming in the garden all afternoon.
meanings.sent2: The drum was thrumming softly in the background of the music.
meanings.sent3: The thrumming of the washing machine made it seem like a happy robot.
meanings.sent4: The thrumming of the rain on the roof was a lullaby for the night.
meanings.sent5: The thrumming of the engine put me to sleep on the long drive.

meanings.definition: Play a stringed instrument idly and monotonously.
meanings.sent1: She was thrumming the guitar absentmindedly while lost in thought.
meanings.sent2: The musician was thrumming the strings of the harp with ease.
meanings.sent3: His thrumming on the banjo added a quirky touch to the song.
meanings.sent4: The thrumming of the ukulele filled the room with a soothing melody.
meanings.sent5: The thrumming of the violin echoed through the empty hall.
